tweet: I'm excited to see progress on Confidential Transactions. Fungibility is the only feature of good money that Bitcoin/Litecoin is missing.  I look forward to adding this to Litecoin when it is ready. 🚀 And this can be done with a soft fork. Stay tuned!
Litecoin and Bitcoin making a move against Monero:   https://t.co/Ot06QXQ8Fu

0.5 $BCH #giveaway to one randomly chosen follower. Rules are 1. Follow 2. Retweet 3. Like 4. Comment about $BTC or $BCH Contest ends 11/30  Winner will be chosen by random num generator.  $ETH $LTC $NEO $ETC $XVG $BTG #Bitcoin $BCC #bitconnect $MER
Now that the size issue of range proofs is solved, we shall see high quality confidential transactions being  implemented on both BTC and LTC soon. @TheRealXinxi @SatoshiLite  https://t.co/RkpD96LXvL
We are looking forward to sponsoring both Litecoin and Bitcoin developers to fulfill our mission.

If #Bitcoin hits $7000 by the end of the day... We will send 0.001 BTC to  EVERYONE that RETWEETS and FOLLOWS #btc #cryptocurrency $dgb $smart $eth $btc $xvg $strat $ltc $xrp $omg $dash $bch $kmd $xvg $cvc $bat $PAY

People always suggest that we shall build something unique to make Litecoin detached with Bitcoin. I think it’s much better for the Litecoin team to help with Bitcoin development and get those new features deployed on both Bitcoin and Litecoin. 1 + 1 > 2 here.
